TEXT.TITLE: HANOVER INSURANCE CO <HINS> GETS NEW EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: Hanover Insurance Co said Joseph Henry has been elected financial vice president of the company and its subsidiary, the Massachusetts Bay Insurance Co. Henry is a former partner of Peat Marwick Mitchell, Hanover said. Reuter
